upanishad: The Upanishads, Part 1 (SBE01): Aitareya-Âranyaka: ... | Sacred Texts Archive
translator: Max Müller (Sacred Books of the East) — Public Domain
text: This is an exact repetition of the third kha n d a. According to the commentator, the third kha n d a was intended for the glory of the first word tad, while the sixth is intended for the glory of the whole hymn.
